experience/examplecorp-senior-engineer.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience/examplecorp-senior-engineer.body:
• Led a team of 5 engineers to develop scalable web services and refactor legacy code, resulting in a 30% performance improvement.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver features on a bi-weekly sprint cycle.
  • Mentored junior developers and established best practices for code reviews and CI/CD pipelines.
